Template.SubjectPart: New Pineapple Points 🍍 purchase request submitted.
Template.HtmlPart:
Hello {{managerUserFirstName}},

A new Pineapple Points 🍍 purchase request for {{itemName}} has been submitted by {{requestUserFullName}}.

To manage purchase requests, please Click Here and log in with your admin account.
Template.TextPart:
Hello {{managerUserFirstName}},
A new Pineapple Points 🍍 purchase request for {{itemName}} has been submitted by {{requestUserFullName}}.
To manage purchase requests, please visit https://pineapplepoints.net/user/confirm-item-purchase and log in with your admin account.
